law.catch_line: Nothing in this title restricts the inherent authority of a trial judge with regard to jurors....

text.section: Nothing in this title restricts the inherent authority of a trial judge with regard to jurors.
Except as to a constitutional question, nothing in this title constitutes a ground for postconviction relief under Title 7 of the Criminal Procedure Article.
Nothing in this title bars a circuit court from using a single procedure for qualification and summonsing as its jury plan authorizes.
